title: Recruiting for Lotus eSports

embed.description: Check out the Lotus eSports community on Discord - hang out with 87 other members and enjoy free voice and text chat.

body:
Hey everyone, i have recently re-branded my org and am looking for members for the main roster and the secondary roster that i have just opened up. I am recruited dedicated players to play in online tournaments.

Lotus eSports - Main roster, Platinum to Challenger (Ideally an average rank of Diamond).
Lotus Academy - Secondary roster. Preferably Plat+ but can start out as an Iron - Gold Team if needed

**Roles available**
Top, Mid (Lotus eSports)
JG, Mid (Lotus Academy)

I am also looking for managers for these two teams, I will go into more detail to what the manager role requires on discord. I am also looking for an artist to design a logo for us.

DM me on discord if you are interested: Dawnfire (Chloe~)#4259
